game.name: Make Cow
game.desc:
Description: Starting from the four elements, can you create a cow? Controls: * Move Cursor - Mouse / Arrow Keys * Grab Resource - Left click / X * Discard Resource - Right click / Z
![Instructions](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/CaterpillarGames/pico8-games/master/carts/make-cow/screenshots/instructions.png)
